channel.title: Incomplete Vector Project
channel.description:
I was going to use this for a logo but GIMP kept crashing as soon as I would have it fully loaded, so I'm just going to discontinue this project. I been working on it for 2 days, the background was hard to find but I still couldn't find one I wanted so I had to improvise with what I had for this project. Its weird how it was working right before I got photoshop CS3 (:D) though, I think GIMP is mad because it has competition now lol.
I got the render from Planet Renders website, its pretty cool. I used the path tool to color him blue. The background came off a flash background in DeviantArt (there's actually a flag behind him, but since he was so huge I had to cover it up). The original scene I wanted was him in a war with a bomb heading to kill him - got the idea thinking about my bro who's in the army (hes a marine).
[b]Stock Image[Render]:[/b] http://i28.tinypic.com/15dwj1u.png [b]Background Image:[/b] [i]Can't remember lol, but its on DeviantArt somewhere[/i]
It's just shown in progress to see how it's changed:
[center] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/b88vog.png[/img] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2e1yi4g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/zir57n.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Incomplete Vector Project
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

No flow.

PS that white loops looks more like you’re trying to show you can do something, rather than actually fitting your project.

That’s what I call effects driven work, which isn’t good.

Read full topic

item.title: Incomplete Vector Project
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

sanga282:

really dont like that :S the techniques are ok but the end result looks like a mismashed effort also is there supposed to be a white line around the top of his head on all of them or is that bad cutting out on your part?

The line was lighting from the original image.
Oh, and it’s all really, really disgusting looking.

If it’s a vector project, you should probably use a program like Illustrator, not whatever you’re using right now.
And it probably shouldn’t have a non-vector image on it.

Read full topic
